Name: Courtroom
Texts:
You are in the courtroom. If you lie, Dinah is saved and Jack is falsely charged.
If you refuse to lie, the Queen executes Dinah.
Will you tell the truth? (Yes or No)

Jack is wrongfully charged and is executed. Nonetheless, the Queen still uses Dinah for her game of croquet and she dies.
What a lose!

After telling the truth, you grow so big that you knock over the entire courtroom.
The Queen's guards come rushing at you.
You wake up and find yourself beside your sister who is now almost done reading her boring book. :-)
